articles.author: Ross A. Lincoln
articles.title: John Oliver Returns to ‘The Daily Show’ to ‘Gloat’ That Trump Turned America Into Monarchy | Video - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: The former cast member joins Jon Stewart for a discussion of how severely things have changed just a month into Trump's second term The post John Oliver...
articles.content: On Monday, perhaps the most successful alum of the Jon Stewart-era of “The Daily Show” is John Oliver, host of “Last Week Tonight,” made a surprise return to the show. But he wasn’t there just to bro… [+4046 chars]
